DataElement.preferredName: Amyloid Subtype Assessment Method Specify Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The free-text field that describes the amyloid subtype assessment method.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An insoluble, fibrous aggregate of misfolded proteins or protein fragments. These fibrillar structures usually exhibit a cross-beta-sheet conformation. Deposition of amyloid aggregates is associated with a number of pathologies including amyloidosis and several neurodegenerative disorders._A group forming a type within a larger type._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of._A means, manner of procedure, or systematic course of actions that have to be performed in order to accomplish a particular goal.
